channel.title: MoparScape Badges!
channel.description:
These are a list of badges/awards that can be received for doing an excellent job and keeping a positive attitude. Thanks to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=121029]LilXCj[/url] for the layout.
[center][b]Staff Related Awards[/b] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/pikastaff.gif[/img] Pikachu Awarded to Mods and Admins.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/santapika.gif[/img] Santa Pikachu Awarded to Admins and Mods, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/squirtle.gif[/img] Squirtle Awarded to Ex-Mods and Ex-Admins.
[b]Programming Awards[/b]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/duke3d.gif[/img] Java Guru Awarded to the best Java Coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/duke3dchristmas.gif[/img] XMas Java Guru Awarded to the best Java Coders, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/Kakuna.gif[/img] VB Awarded to vb coders. (Symbolises the hidden capabilities of vb).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/Flare.gif[/img]Delphi Awarded to delphi coders. (Symbolises the power of delphi).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/c.png[/img] C Awarded to the best C programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/togepi.gif[/img] C++ Awarded to skilled C++ coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/csharp.png[/img] C# Awarded to skilled C# programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/python.png[/img] Python Awarded to skilled Python programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/lisp.png[/img] Lisp Awarded to the best Lisp programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/onix.gif[/img] Web Developer Awarded to good web developers (html, php, jsp etc.)
[b]Miscellaneous Awards[/b]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/lapras.gif[/img] Graphics Master Awarded to graphics masters of the site.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/awards/mcwaward.png[/img] MCW Winner Awarded to winners of the MoparScape Model Contest competition.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/bi5r0h.png[/img] Tutorial Author Awarded to the best author writers
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1jrno3.png[/img] Server Helper Awarded to the best helpers in the RuneScape Private Server Help section.

item.title: MoparScape Badges!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:181, topic:469775”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=587068.msg4507826#msg4507826 date=1462152429]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=587068.msg4507825#msg4507825 date=1462152108]

[quote author=Jmood link=topic=587068.msg4507824#msg4507824 date=1462152002]

There should definitely be forum veteran badges of some sort.

for what someone with only 18 hours of time and 16 posts can claim it because their only real achievement in this community is an account registered in 2007?
[/quote]damn

was I too harsh? Sorry.
[/quote]no ur fine

I am just being elitist cuz of you know badge.
[/quote]that one was pretty harsh it hurts[/quote]I win

Read full topic
